Changelog.BugFix: When deselecting a File in the Add By Torrent by File dialog AzSMRC crashes
It was impossible to set specific Up/Download Speeds per Torrent
Fix for "Ghost" torrents in the remote
Bug in Plugin Loader was fixed
allow to stop the torrent on error
Changelog.Feature: Encoding Selection for new Torrents
Plugins for AzSMRC (ScaneRSS)
Added Support StatusMailer
Added support for AzJabber plugin when it is ready in v1.1
Remote Azureus Plugin Configuration
Added FirstTime Configuration Wizard
AJAX based WebUI
Added a selectAll, unselectAll, and selectInverse menu to the details table for add torrent by file dialog
extended the ScrapeDialog with the ability to download torrents from an url and display them
SSL availability & status is shown in the Az plugin config
Changelog.Change: New Logo and Splash Screen
Connection Dialog can now save unlimited profiles
Message Popup Shell was changed to behave like the Az one, especially not blocking AzSMRC when many messages are coming in
Shells now have custom icons
Switched from COConfigurationManager to PluginConfig Unsafe methods

Changelog.BugFix: Fix 'Manage Users' so that all features now work
Fixed many SWT errors for Update Dialog and ServerUpdate Dialog
Fixed the updater so that it works correctly now
Fixed many Null Point Errors and Widget is Disposed Errors
Changelog.Feature: Main tables are now sortable by column
My Tracker tab added to manage shares. Includes Hosting and Publishing of a torrent file
Added the ability to use sounds
A normal user can now change their password remotely
Added a Scrape and Announce button to the torrent details tab
Double-Clicking on the connection icon or the SSL icon will now open the Server Details tab
Changelog.Change: Display the how long it took to complete the download in the sliding alert window
Major work on the Downloads and Seeding tables to increase speed and stability
Tray menu now includes a 'silent mode' to disable all sounds
Tray menu now includes disable all Popups switch
Tray menu and ToolBar menu now includes a quick pause feature to pause torrents for a given amount of time
Added an Update File stats button to the files sub tab of the torrent details
Enhanced Scrape Dialog some to allow for passing a torrent file to it directly
Many tweaks to the transfer packages to reduce their size, especially if there are many stopped torrents

Changelog.BugFix: fixed crash in Azureus Remote Configuration
Changelog.Feature: Automatic ErrorReporter
Graphical Updater

Changelog.BugFix: Fixed the timer not switching to tray mode when the main window was 'hidden' instead of disposed
Changelog.Feature: Displays Remote Drive Size
Remote Azureus Config (will be extended)
uploaded torrents can now be deleted locally
More than one connection can now be saved
Remote Info with remote Azureus Version, as well as remote Plugin version
Experiemental Azureus remote update
Individual torrent speeds can now be set
You can enable showing the Server Url in title bar now
FastMode: this will make AzSMRC more responsive at the cost of more bandwidth
You can create a SSL Certificate on the server now via AzSMRC
You can now drop Torrents on AzSMRC
Changelog.Change: The Tray Icon behaivior was changed to One-Click
Improved Clipboard monitor

Changelog.BugFix: UserManager Bug: Users were not read correctly
Changelog.Feature: Serverless Torrent Scraper with ability to select files and send torrent to server
Remote Azureus restart
Ability to move Data Files of a seeding torrent
File Selection for a torrent
Added splash screen with ability to disable it in the Preferences
Added ability to enable/disable Single User Mode through the remote control via Preferences
Changelog.Change: Improved the Updater
Preferences were expanded to allow more control over exiting and tray behavior
Enhanced top menu with more quick access to many features

Changelog.BugFix: column share ratio can now be selected
Changelog.Feature: File Selection on addDownload
Builtin - Updater
SingleUserMode for all those who don't want to use the multiuser part
Clipboardmonitor for Torrent URLs
Changelog.Change: Totally improved preferences Tab
You can disable AutoImport now
Added some more buttons to the Toolsbar, like start, stop and remove
Added MenuBar
You can disable minimize to tray on close, this will close the program if you close the shell
